thread.title: Sandra Lee
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Sandra Lee

author: Sandra Lee
title: Sandra Lee
text:
We are very impressed with your product and service! I sent the strawberry shortcake and the dessert sampler to my out of state daughter and family as a birthday surprise. They are raving about the quality and taste. She told me the cake and treats were so delicious, fresh and they were beautifully packaged including satin ribbon. And she is a stickler for quality items and presentation.
The items were packed in dry ice. They were delivered on time and in perfect condition. I took a risk ordering because I had not heard of "Bake Me A Wish". I am so glad we gave you a try. I plan on ordering again and will let my friends know!
